body: Thanks for replying, my english is not very good. I didn't understand the reason you said. When registerJsFile or registerCssFile have depends, the options will not work.The dependent AssetBundle option of individual script / CSS also does not work. What is the meaning of this depends.
The options will work but will not be passed to dependencies. That was made on purpose and is exptected.
Do you mean that zui.min.js itself won't get `appendTimestamp` in URL?

> Do you mean that zui.min.js itself won't get `appendTimestamp` in URL?

Yes. zui.min.js `appendTimestamp` and `position` are not work.
`position` is actually expected since taking it into account will likely cause conflict with dependencies positions. But `appendTimestamp` not adding timestamp to primary asset isn't correct.

> `position` is actually expected since taking it into account will likely cause conflict with dependencies positions. But `appendTimestamp` not adding timestamp to primary asset isn't correct.

Thank you for your answer.
